description: Utility constructors for resets, accessibility, interactions, scrolling, transforms, debugging, performance, printing and motion

sprouts.name: sprout-list-reset
sprouts.description: Reset list styles, margins and padding

sprouts.name: sprout-button-reset
sprouts.description: Reset button styles to inherit from parent

sprouts.name: sprout-link-reset
sprouts.description: Reset link styles to inherit color and remove decoration

sprouts.name: sprout-input-reset
sprouts.description: Reset input styles to inherit from parent

sprouts.name: sprout-sr-only
sprouts.description: Screen reader only content (completely hidden visually)

sprouts.name: sprout-sr-only-focusable
sprouts.description: Screen reader only content that becomes visible when focused

sprouts.name: sprout-focus-visible
sprouts.description: Focus ring for keyboard navigation only

sprouts.name: sprout-select-all
sprouts.description: Enable text selection for all content

sprouts.name: sprout-debug-outline
sprouts.description: Debug utility to add colored outline

sprouts.name: sprout-debug-bg
sprouts.description: Debug utility to add background color

sprouts.name: sprout-debug-grid
sprouts.description: Debug utility to show grid overlay

sprouts.name: sprout-debug-spacing
sprouts.description: Debug utility to show spacing grid

sprouts.name: sprout-contain-layout
sprouts.description: CSS containment for layout, style and paint

sprouts.name: sprout-print-break-before
sprouts.description: Force page break before element when printing

sprouts.name: sprout-print-break-after
sprouts.description: Force page break after element when printing

sprouts.name: sprout-reduce-motion
sprouts.description: Disable animations and transitions for users who prefer reduced motion

sprouts.name: sprout-motion-safe
sprouts.description: Apply styles only when user doesn't prefer reduced motion
